section.title: For a Standalone Chemistry Installation
section.p: The hyphenation dictionaries are located in: [CHEMISTRY_INSTALL_DIR]/config/hyph. The .xml files allow you to read the licensing terms. The .hyp files are the compiled dictionaries that actually uses.

One simple way to add more dictionaries:
Download and extract the offo-hyphenation-compiled.zip file. This file is a bundle of many dictionary files.
Copy the fop-hyph.jar file to the [CHEMISTRY_INSTALL_DIR]/lib directory.
If you just need a single dictionary, place the .hyp file in the [CHEMISTRY_INSTALL_DIR]/config/hyph directory.

section.title: For Chemistry Embedded into an Oxygen XML Editor Installation
section.p:
